potapovQuest.scripts:
LOG = globals().get('LOG') """:type: typing.LOG_DEBUG_DEV"""
QUEST_EVENT_TYPE = globals().get('QUEST_EVENT_TYPE') """:type: quest_definitions.QUEST_EVENT_TYPE"""
quest_progress = globals().get('quest_progress') """:type: quest_progress"""
server_constants = globals().get('server_constants') """:type: server_constants"""
items = globals().get('items') """:type: items"""
ATTACK_REASON = globals().get('ATTACK_REASON') """:type: constants.ATTACK_REASON"""
filters = globals().get('filters') """:type: battle_result_event_list_helpers"""
BLOCKED_HITS_IN_BATTLE = 'blockedHitsInBattle' BLOCKED_HITS_IN_BATTLE_SERIES = 'blockedHitsInBattleSeries' ALIVE = 'alive' ALIVE_SERIES = 'aliveSeries'
def onFinishBattle(eventType, eventData, quest, processor): questProgress = quest_progress.BaseQuestProgress(quest.config, processor.getQuestProgress(quest.progressID))
avatarResults = eventData['avatarResults'] eventLog = avatarResults['damageFromEnemiesEventList']
if avatarResults['killerID'] == 0: questProgress.setCompleted(ALIVE) questProgress.increaseUntilComplete(ALIVE_SERIES, 1)
blockedFromTanksNumber = sum(1 for blockShots in filters.countBlockShotsFromTanks(eventLog).itervalues() if blockShots > 0)
if questProgress.increaseUntilComplete(BLOCKED_HITS_IN_BATTLE, blockedFromTanksNumber): questProgress.increaseUntilComplete(BLOCKED_HITS_IN_BATTLE_SERIES, 1)
eventData['results'].update(processor.checkComplete(questProgress, quest.progressID, additionalProgressID=ALIVE_SERIES))
processor.setQuestProgress(quest.progressID, questProgress.save())
def onInit(eventType, eventData, quest, processor): for event in events.iterkeys(): processor.subscribe(event, quest) return True
events = { QUEST_EVENT_TYPE.INIT: onInit, QUEST_EVENT_TYPE.FINISH_BATTLE: onFinishBattle, }
def quest(eventType, eventData, quest, processor): LOG('QUEST EVENT:', eventType, quest.id) return events.get(eventType, lambda *args: False)(eventType, eventData, quest, processor)
